designations.source: A review of the Hemiptera of Great Britain: The shieldbugs and allied families
designations.source_description: This report was commissioned to update the national status of shield bugs using IUCN methodology for assessing threat. It covers all species of Coreoidea, Pentatomoidea & Pyrrhocoroidea in Great Britain, identifying those that are rare and/or under threat as well as non threatened and non-native species.
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: Taxa which are neither threatened nor near threatened.
designations.comments: Historically a coastal species; continued northerly and inland range expansion. Likely to be present in >100 hectads once recent records are fully collated, hence not regarded as NS
